text.autoconfig.contagion.title: Contagion
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.infecti: Time in seconds until the infection kills the player | default: 600
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.baseInf: Base chance in % an attack will infect the player | default: 80 | range: 0 - 100
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.minimum: The infection chance can not be lower than this value (even with armor) | default: 10 | range: 0 - 100
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.armorLo: Wearing armor lowers the infection chance
If enabled, wearing armor will lower the infection chance (full Netherite will lower the chance by 60%) | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.enableR: Random symptoms can occur when infected
If enabled, random symptoms can occur when infected | default: enabled
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.randomS: Time in seconds a random symptom will last | default: 30
Random symptom chance (in % | checked every second)
Chance in % a random symptom can occur when infected | default: 3 | range: 0 - 100
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.immunit: Time in seconds after drinking a cure the player is immune to new infections | default: 120
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.milkCur: The infection can be cured by drinking milk
If enabled, drinking milk will cure the player if infected | default: false
text.autoconfig.contagion.option.totemPr: Holding a totem will prevent death from infection
If true, holding a totem will prevent the player from dying when the infection timer runs out | default: true
